The pseudonymous crypto trader @GiganticRebirth was feeling bearish at the market top last November. This is how his @RebirthDAO shorted the market crash. @0x_bae reports.
https://t.co/tHHpWnyRuG

Haven't logged into this shadowbanned account in awhile

Lot of DMs asking if I died

For those that didn't know

I've been tweeting on @GCRClassic for an entire year

Peace Be Upon You
I had always assumed they were hedging it on betfair

I hope. for the sake of the industry, that the final piece of my prophecy does not unfold

These predictions were made in 2021 at 50k, so don't assume it's going to bottom tick some precise number;  it's always darkest before the dawn

If you're looking for advice as to where to find safety

The same advice I gave last week, is where I currently stand;  shame my shadowban prevented more people from seeing it

Can't believe they let me short the top of LUNA [Classic] again, 6 months after the original

But all good investments must one day be realized
Total funding:  $878,600.04

GCR has been liquidated https://t.co/cE0wHqmQM7

Ironically, most bullish path for $DOGE would be for twitter to never actually integrate it into anything

Would be for Musk to tease, hint, meme, riddle, joke, that there was a master plan for years; allow people's imaginations to go wild

We call it the Hoskinson; never deliver

What bear market?
We just do a little inverse investing when traders begin to imagine it's a new paradigm again https://t.co/VZjPto30go
cleanse your mind of your ....

Impressive achievement in decentralized coordination

Many will not fully appreciate the level of difficulty in what was accomplished

Volatile day in the markets

Bitcoin sold off heavily with equities on hotter than expected CPI
Heavy sell off in LUNC on news that Terraform CEO Do Kwon faces arrest warrant in South Korea

Update on my positions [ + fully out of my modest LUNA 2.0 short for now, ~$2.5] https://t.co/UboP3YX7MF

Surprisingly well written briefing
Time is a flat circle

Pair trading was an abandoned art discarded in the indiscriminate bull market
When you long strength against collapse, you win on both sides https://t.co/zQiOm4Git5

4th of July financial advice

Long trump, short DeSantis for the 2024 republican nomination

wherever you can source liquidity [BetFair, online bookies such as ladbrokes/paddypower;  PredictIt; 
crypto sources Augur, Polymarket, Kalshi, etc]

https://t.co/GLyCINK65g

English poet Thomas Howell used to have an old idiom;  don't count your chickens before they hatch

I have acquired the 120,000 LUNA shares necessary to cover "risk" associated with the 20 million USD in escrow pending March 2023 price

Final cost basis to cover:  72 cents https://t.co/3qcsUPNFd5
note, some of the quotes from the interview are now old
My "inverse investments" are with great companies https://t.co/MviEvlouQb

Update on "the bet":  Since my 20 million wasn't able to be matched on $LUNA

I made the bet by myself with derivatives https://t.co/l1SjpFMm99

thinking of setting up a clinic for trading addictionology
most are losing money through physiological dependence;  nothing more

a nice resort somewhere in Asia
nice comforts for all inmates to help unwind, relax, and most importantly

cleanse your mind of your peak net worth https://t.co/gqUEnHRVnI
the market cap of the APE token [6 billion/22b fd] now far eclipses the total cap of BAYC [4 billion];  and is also doing far more volume than alt2 tokens
in your heart, you know it's true

While I'd like to take credit for predicting on @BanklessHQ that other L1s would join the $UST game, that idea came from the wizard @GiganticRebirth.

Key Q. now is whether alt-algostables will complement $UST, or we get a clash that makes the Curve Wars look like a pillow fight.

The success MATIC had gigantically rebirthing as POLYGON in 2021, led dozens of vaporchains to EVM rebrands

So too, WAVES has runup 5x in past month repositioning itself as a crude facsimile of LUNA

Other teams have taken note; market will soon be flooded with more copycats

Justin Sun adopting the Terra playbook to launch an algo stable with higher yield than Luna is just about the most preordained timeline

Many have already forgotten Sun was the first mover with L1 EVM in '20 defi summer with JustSwap

correct that exit polls are illegal in FR
however, Belgium's RTBF, is not bound by FR media blackout, releases early exits

Western traders didnt know this in 2017, which allowed more savvy traders to get an early edge on projecting the outcome [mostly alpha for the MOV markets]

In 2017 there was a pervasive belief with both pundits and punters in 'shy Le Pen" voters 

Contrary, when the votes were counted, LP actually greatly underperformed polling

While 2022 wont be another landslide, we will get the identical result for both round 1 + 2

Macron wins

imagine if instead of holding undercollateralized stablecoins [that are increasingly going to be hunted, seized, and possibly frozen by regulators]

you could just hold BTC

and if, risk averse, you could even short the BTC you hold, collect free funding, and be in synthetic fiat

this isn't going to be popular, but think it's important to drive home;  trading losses don't compare to full hack

and if you're going to self custody, put heavy duty hours into research

bounced right off that $10 meme support as expected

but not fully a meme;  hard round numbers are obvious convergence points on nebulously valued, reflexive assets;   respect the schelling point
alt3 volume
lowkey tier1 influence:  @insiliconot
Nearly 8 months since this prediction, NFT projects are realizing tokenization is the path towards liquidity, volume, and maximum profit

Since @cobie has tweeted he is setting up multisig 

We owe it to the culture to put some actual real size/conviction on this bet, as was initial spirit

Offering to double this up to 20 million with @stablekwon

I will match/donate 1 milli to @angelprotocol charity if he accepts

accepted

10 million sent to DAO wallet

Interested in same bet for 10 million dollars [considered offering 50 million, but escrow becomes tricky]

Would donate half to charity

Expect price to pump short term, but in 1 year, supremely confident the current narrative is lost

@stablekwon
Manchin and Sinema will vote to confirm

The reason I decided to look into token unlocks was actually a tweet from GCR himself: https://t.co/VjLrdRfbYJ

This together with some great tweets like this https://t.co/Y54x32Ll5f, made me realise 2022 is the year of unlocks.

A few days ago @GiganticRebirth's ‚ÄòBig short‚Äô article popped up. Great read.

A while back I did research on token unlocks myself. I‚Äôve attached a sheet with unlock info of some tokens

In the thread below, I will share some thoughts on FDV & Unlocks

the tree of life
Alexa, what month is it?

Compare the market cap of NFT projects to some prominent meme tokens

-SHIBA reached 60 billion cap at peak
-Not a single NFT has a 1 billion dollar cap [exception BAYC]

Altcoins 2.0 seem overvalued relative to NFT growth;  I predict tokenization of NFTs to eat into alt2 volume

imagine a world where you could long or short the networth, earnings, valuation, and growth of other individuals [not corporations]

now a shareholder in other people;  identifying [+ cultivating] under the radar talent, or flipping bearish on someone as you sense they had peaked

[2]
In reality, theres dozens of other coins with similar setups outside SOL

1-This is PvP season
2-The Stanfords are coming

Youre only go to be rewarded for rigorous research and contrarian insights;  you have to shed a lot of the habits you acquired the past year and level up

[1]

The market converged around narrative that only SOL ecosystem tokens had low float/high FDV model

Crowded around the same 8 shorts, months after I introduced, the Big Short thesis [tokens down 90%]

And after I announced I closed those positions

$MER just another example

Two ways to view a short

1  A trade
2 'Inverse investment'

If confidence interval for 1yr price > 95%, will 'invest' + not concern myself with short term gyrations

I've chosen to 'invest' in $PEOPLE at 9c;  squeeze to ATH is possible, but my investment is with a great company

Future forecast update
